surface_layer.definition: Maintenance strategy based on the actual condition of an asset, rather than predefined schedules.

deep_layer.mechanism: Monitors equipment condition using sensors and data analysis to predict failures and optimize maintenance schedules.
deep_layer.origin: Developed as a more efficient alternative to time-based maintenance.

examples: Oil analysis for lubricant condition monitoring

citations: Utility's Cooling Tower: The Unsung Hero of the Lubrication Industry
